div.p: This guide provides step-by-step instructions for installing and configuring SecureVault on your system.
SecureVault is a robust security software designed to safeguard your sensitive information. This installation guide ensures a smooth setup process for optimal use of SecureVault's features.

li.span: Download the SecureVault installer from the official website.
Run the installer executable and follow the on-screen instructions
li.div: Ensure that you have administrator privileges on your system

li.span: Choose the installation directory and click "Install."
